name: We Have to Go Deeper!
description:
Playable online! Online leaderboards! All assets (Art, Music, SFX) created in 72 hours! You see a job listing in the newspaper which reads, “Wanted: adventurous lab assistant ready to dive deep into the unknown realms of science.” Oddly, there are no further details. Strapped for cash as you are, you decide to take the job.
By the time you find out that the position is unpaid, you’re already sealed into the submarine. The professor who hired you seems to be obsessed with what lies in the farthest reaches of the ocean, and has built his own capsule to explore it. He’s placed you in charge of piloting the sub while he makes his observations. Can you brave the treacherous waters? Can you handle the pestering professor? Play now to find out!
  • Explore the unknown depths!
  • Navigate the obstacles in your path!
  • Contain your rage at the overbearing professor!
Controls
  • Mouse: Aim thruster
  • Hold Left Click: Brake & charge thruster
  • Release Left Click Fire thruster
  • Hold Right Click Extra Brake
Alternate Controls (for trackpad users)
  • Hold Space: Brake & charge thruster
  • Release Space Fire thruster
  • Shift: Extra Brake
  • Scott S: Programming
  • Nate D (Suzu_Mushi_): Level Design
  • Jasper S: Programming, Network Programming, SFX, UI
  • Hanna Habela: Art
  • Alucard: Music
